resources.string: The Keep of the Lich Lord
Your have already chosen this spell.
Storage permission is required to used this app!
Sorry, this gamebook is not implemented yet!
You are already at maximum Stamina!
You have replenished your Skill level!
You have replenished your Stamina level!
You have replenished your Luck level (+1)!
If using shovel, 2 points gets subtracted to combat roll. When hitting the robot deals 6 damage.
If the combat roll is won by 4 or more points, Wasp Fighter deals double damage.
This robot can evade other robots with very high speed.
If combat roll is 18 or more, the Tropper XI suffers no damage.
After a combat roll bigger than 16, the Serpent VII deals 1 automatic damage point each turn afterwards.
3 optional sonic shots. Deals 1d6 damage for robots and 2d6 damage for dinosaurs.
The Crusher deals double damage in each successfull attack.
When Battleman wins the round with a roll difference of 4 or more points it deals an additional damage point.
Each combat round supertank deals 1 damage point due to the presence of smaller arms.
If the combat roll is won by 4 or more points, Wasp Fighter deals double damage.
Player can only parry in next round after losing a combat round.
You\'ve defeated an enemy by sudden death!
You have blocked the enemy attack!
Both you and the enemy have missed

You must set the number of enemy forces!
You must commit some of your troops to the battle!
You must distribute the losses for your army.

and you suffer the loss of %1$d troops.
